QuestData.Title: Seed of Hope
QuestData.Description: Thalyssra was wise to send you in search of the arcan'dor, though she underestimates its power.$B$BShe will learn - as will the others.$B$BBut it will take time. And with hunger gnawing at their very souls, the Nightfallen will need your help to survive.
QuestData.RewardText: In the changing of seasons, the truth will be revealed.
